sentences.en: He had a thin aquiline nose and deep-set brown eyes.
sentences.cn: 他长着窄长的鹰钩鼻和深陷的褐色眼睛。

sentences.en: The theology was complicated, despite the jut - jawed charm and aquiline intensity with which it was expressed.
sentences.cn: 尽管他有着极大的热情和非凡的敏锐,但神学本身对他来讲依然极其复杂.

words.tran_cn: 鹰的；似鹰的，像鹰的；钩状的

trans.tran_cn: 鹰的，似鹰的，（鼻子）钩状的
trans.tran_en: If someone has an aquiline nose or profile, their nose is large, thin, and usually curved
